rules_text:
When Sabne's Autumn enters, search your library for a Forest card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle. You gain 3 life.
{1}{G}{G}: Transform Sabne's Autumn. Activate only if your fealty to Forests is five or greater.
rules_text2:
Indestructible
Lands you control have “{T}: Add {G}{G}.”
{5}{G}{G}: Double the power and toughness of each creature you control until end of turn.
notes: !append (Each Forest you control counts towards your fealty to Forests.)
